author: mmao
msg: * Apply patch contributed by Unreal Jiang

author: ngn
msg: Adding support for specifying passive port ranges. All combinations of single ports, multiple ports and ranges (both open ended and closed) are supported. The current implementation is somewhat naive and can be improved for better performance and memory usage in the future

author: felicity
msg: optimize the bayes stop-list via Regexp::Trie, add a pointer to the wiki page which has the word list, etc.
